Control Name: 4.1 Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for unauthorized API calls
Control Statement: It is recommended that a metric filter and alarm be established for unauthorized API calls. Monitoring unauthorized API calls will help reveal application errors and may reduce time to detect malicious activity.
